mapper.insert: insert into fund_transaction (code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, dividend_amount_per_share, trading_platform, status, mark, type) values (#{code}, #{applicationDate}, #{transactionDate}, #{confirmationDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{nav}, #{share}, #{dividendAmountPerShare}, #{tradingPlatform}, #{status}, #{mark}, #{type})
mapper.select: select distinct code from fund_transaction where status < 4 and (mark is null or mark = '')

select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, dividend_amount_per_share, trading_platform, status, mark, type from fund_transaction
and status = #{status1} or status = #{status2}

select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark, type from fund_transaction where (nav is null or nav = '') and (share is null or share = '') and type = #{type}

select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark, type from fund_transaction where code = #{code} and transaction_date = #{redemptionDate} and amount is null and fee is null and nav is null and type = #{type}
